text:
1. Gathering the necessary tools and equipment for a haircut
2. Sectioning the hair into manageable portions
3. Wetting the hair
4. Combing or brushing the hair
5. Cutting the hair to the desired length or style
6. Trimming the hair around the edges or for layers
7. Thinning or texturizing the hair if desired
8. Styling the hair using various techniques (e.g., blow-drying, curling, straightening)
9. Cleaning up any loose hair or debris
10. Checking the overall result and making any necessary adjustments.
